Meet our happy clients and read what they say about our brand AA Group.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.22.1″ custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_testimonial author=”Saad Ali” job_title=”Founder” company_name=”Diginautix” portrait_url=”https://AA Group.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/24231858_1682195411825391_8365154571469582335_n.jpg” quote_icon=”off” quote_icon_color=”#2b87da” _builder_version=”4.22.1″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_direction=”135deg” background_color_gradient_stops=”#29c4a9 0%|#2b87da 100%” background_color_gradient_start=”#29c4a9″ background_color_gradient_end=”#2b87da” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”100px||||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” box_shadow_style=”preset4″ box_shadow_horizontal=”0px” box_shadow_vertical=”18px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(43,135,218,0.38)” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” sticky_enabled=”0″ custom_margin_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”100px||||false|false”]

AA Group always delivers beyond our expectation. The creativity along with the deadline is what these teams meet up Everytime. For stellar websites and Kick-Ass social media presence please chose team AA Group for spreading your digital footprints in an effective manner.

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_testimonial author=”Salman Rajput ” job_title=”Head of Marketing” company_name=”Digital Mahout” portrait_url=”https://AA Group.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/Sanjay-Bhatt-Copy.jpg” quote_icon=”off” quote_icon_color=”#2b87da” _builder_version=”4.22.1″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_direction=”135deg” background_color_gradient_stops=”#29c4a9 0%|#2b87da 100%” background_color_gradient_start=”#29c4a9″ background_color_gradient_end=”#2b87da” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”50px|||” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” box_shadow_style=”preset4″ box_shadow_horizontal=”0px” box_shadow_vertical=”18px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(43,135,218,0.38)” global_colors_info=”{}”]

AA Group team is committed to delivering value. The team have worked on one of my projects and I am really happy to see their dedication towards successful completion of the project. He has an eye for details and is a subject matter expert. Would love to work with you again.

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_testimonial author=”Chris Campbell” job_title=”Head of Media & Entertainment” company_name=”SmartBeings” portrait_url=”https://AA Group.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/chris.jpg” quote_icon=”off” quote_icon_color=”#2b87da” _builder_version=”4.22.1″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_direction=”135deg” background_color_gradient_stops=”#29c4a9 0%|#2b87da 100%” background_color_gradient_start=”#29c4a9″ background_color_gradient_end=”#2b87da” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”100px|||” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” hover_enabled=”0″ border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” box_shadow_style=”preset4″ box_shadow_horizontal=”0px” box_shadow_vertical=”18px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(43,135,218,0.38)” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

AA Group is a trusted partner whom we selected after thorough evaluation against other development companies. The team is efficient, creative and has an amazing customer relationship management.I would recommend anyone to AA Group.
